mean_cn: n. 保释，保释人，保释金，杓；  v. 保释，帮助某人脱离困境，往外舀水
mean_en: an amount of money given to a court to allow a prisoner to leave jail and return later for a trial
short_phrase: get out of prison on bail
sentence: They set bail at $5000: I don't have that much, so I'm still in jail.
sentence_trans: 他们把保险金定成5千美金。我没有那么多，所以还在监狱中。
